actionendsimmediately.name: After Start-of-Turn Skills Trigger, Action Ends Immediately
actionendsimmediately.description: Through unit's next action, after start-of-turn skills trigger, action ends immediately.

airorders.name: Air Orders (Status Effect)
airorders.description: Unit can move to a space adjacent to any ally within 2 spaces.

anathema.name: Anathema
anathema.description: Inflicts Spd/Def/Res-4 on foes within 3 spaces of unit during combat.

assigndecoy.name: Assign Decoy
assigndecoy.description: If foe's Range = unit's Range and foe initiates combat against an ally within 2 spaces of unit, triggers【Savior】on unit (that turn only; triggers only if unit is not equipped with a skill that can trigger the Savior effect).

beastcavalry.name: Beast (Cavalry)
beastcavalry.description: At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If unit transforms, grants Atk+2, and if unit initiates combat, inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foe during combat and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

bonded.name: Bonded
bonded.description: Grants a status that can trigger certain skill effects to unit for 1 turn.

bonus.name: Bonus
bonus.description: All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).

bonusdoubler.name: Bonus Doubler (Status Effect)
bonusdoubler.description: Grants bonus to Atk/Spd/Def/Res during combat = current bonus on each of unit's stats for 1 turn. Calculates each stat bonus independently.

bulwark.name: Bulwark
bulwark.description:
Foes with Range = 1 cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit (does not affect foes with Pass skills).
Foes with Range = 2 cannot move through spaces within 2 spaces of unit (does not affect foes with Pass skills).

cancelaffinity.name: Cancel Affinity (Status Effect)
cancelaffinity.description: If unit has weapon-triangle disadvantage, reverses weapon-triangle advantage granted by foe's skills for 1 turn.

canto\uff11.name: Canto (１)
canto\uff11.description: After an attack, Assist skill, or structure destruction, unit can move １ space(s).

canto\uff12.name: Canto (２)
canto\uff12.description: After an attack, Assist skill, or structure destruction, unit can move ２ space(s).

canto\uff13.name: Canto (３)
canto\uff13.description: After an attack, Assist skill, or structure destruction, unit can move ３ space(s).

cantocontrol.name: Canto Control (Status Effect)
cantocontrol.description: Limits the number of spaces target can move with Canto through their next action. If target's Range = 1, target can move 1 space when Canto triggers. If target's Range = 2, target's action ends when Canto triggers.

cantorem.name: Canto (Rem.)
cantorem.description: After an attack, Assist skill, or structure destruction, unit can move spaces = any movement not already used that turn. (If unit used a movement skill that warped them, its remaining movement is 0.)

cantorem1.name: Canto (Rem. +1)
cantorem1.description: After an attack, Assist skill, or structure destruction, unit can move spaces = any movement not already used that turn +1. (If unit used a movement skill that warped them, its remaining movement is 0.)

cantoremmin1.name: Canto (Rem.; Min １)
cantoremmin1.description: After an attack, Assist skill, or structure destruction, unit can move spaces = any movement not already used that turn (min. １; if unit used a movement skill that warped them, unit can move １ space(s)).

cantorem1min2.name: Canto (Rem. +1; Min ２)
cantorem1min2.description: After an attack, Assist skill, or structure destruction, unit can move spaces = any movement not already used that turn (min. ２; if unit used a movement skill that warped them, unit can move ２ space(s)).

cantodistmax3.name: Canto (Dist.; Max ３)
cantodistmax3.description: After an attack, Assist skill, or structure destruction, unit can move spaces = number of spaces from start position to end position unit moved prior to taking action (max ３).

cantodist1max4.name: Canto (Dist. +1; Max ４)
cantodist1max4.description: After an attack, Assist skill, or structure destruction, unit can move spaces = number of spaces from start position to end position unit moved prior to taking action (max ４).

cantodist2max5.name: Canto (Dist. +2; Max ５)
cantodist2max5.description: After an attack, Assist skill, or structure destruction, unit can move spaces = number of spaces from start position to end position of unit before the above, +2. (Max ５.)

cantoally2.name: Canto (Ally 2)
cantoally2.description: After an attack, Assist skill, or structure destruction, unit can move to a space adjacent to any ally within 2 spaces.

cantoally5.name: Canto (Ally 5)
cantoally5.description: After an attack, Assist skill, or structure destruction, unit can move to a space adjacent to any ally within 5 spaces.

cantounit3x3.name: Canto (Unit 3×3)
cantounit3x3.description: After an attack, Assist skill, or structure destruction, unit can move to a space within 3 rows and 3 columns centered on unit.

cantorecall.name: Canto (Recall)
cantorecall.description: After an attack, Assist skill, or structure destruction, unit can return to the space they moved from.

cantox.name: Canto (X)
cantox.description: After an attack, Assist skill, or structure destruction, unit can move X spaces.

charge.name: Charge
charge.description: Unit can move up to 3 spaces in any cardinal direction. (Cannot move through foes, terrain that blocks movement, or effects of skills like Obstruct. Granted movement treated as Warp movement.)

counterattacksdisrupted.name: Counterattacks Disrupted
counterattacksdisrupted.description: Unit cannot counterattack through its next action.

dagger\uff15.name: Dagger ５
dagger\uff15.description: After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Def/Res-５ on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.

dagger\uff16.name: Dagger ６
dagger\uff16.description: After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Def/Res-６ on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.

dagger\uff17.name: Dagger ７
dagger\uff17.description: After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Def/Res-７ on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.

deepstar.name: Deep Star (Status Effect)
deepstar.description: For 1 turn, if it is unit's first combat initiated by foe that turn, reduces damage from foe's first attack by 80% during combat (that turn only; "first attack" normally means only the first strike; for effects that grant "unit attacks twice," it means the first and second strikes).

deepwounds.name: Deep Wounds
deepwounds.description: Unit's HP cannot be healed through its next action.

desperation.name: Desperation (Status Effect)
desperation.description: Grants the following effect for 1 turn: "If unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack."

discord.name: Discord
discord.description: Inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-X on unit during combat (X = 2 + number of allies within 2 spaces of unit; max 5) through its next action.

distantswap.name: Distant Swap
distantswap.description: Range = 2. Unit and target ally swap spaces.

divinenectar.name: Divine Nectar (Status Effect)
divinenectar.description:
Neutralizes【Deep Wounds】during combat.
Restores 20 HP to unit as unit's combat begins (triggers after effects that deal damage as combat begins; only highest value applied; does not stack). If it is unit's first combat initiated by foe or first combat initiated by unit that turn, reduces damage from foe's attacks by 10 during combat (excluding area-of-effect Specials).

divinelyinspiring.name: Divinely Inspiring
divinelyinspiring.description: Grants bonus to unit's Atk/Spd/Def/Res = X × 3 (X = number of allies with the Divinely Inspiring effect within 3 spaces of unit, excluding unit; max 2), grants Special cooldown count-X to unit before foe's first attack, and when unit deals damage to foe during combat, restores X × 4 HP to unit during combat.

divineveinflame.name: Divine Vein (Flame)
divineveinflame.description: Applies the following effects on space: Acts as difficult terrain for foes with Range = 2 (moving over this space costs +1 movement; does not apply to "cannot be slowed by terrain" effects; movement cost cannot exceed unit's allowed movement). At start of enemy phase, deals 7 damage to foe, and also, as combat begins, deals an additional 7 damage to foe (effects that reduce damage "during combat" do not apply; will not reduce foe's HP below 1). (Divine Vein effects do not stack; replaces any existing Divine Vein effect; Divine Vein effects applied simultaneously cancel each other out.)

divineveingreen.name: Divine Vein (Green)
divineveingreen.description: Applies the following effects on space for foes: Foe cannot warp from this space or into this space (does not affect units with Pass skills or warp effects from structures like camps and fortresses in Rival Domains). Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack (only highest value applied; does not stack). (Divine Vein effects do not stack; replaces any existing Divine Vein effect; Divine Vein effects applied simultaneously cancel each other out.)

divineveinhaze.name: Divine Vein (Haze)
divineveinhaze.description: Applies the following effects on space: Inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-5 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat. (Divine Vein effects do not stack; replaces any existing Divine Vein effect; Divine Vein effects applied simultaneously cancel each other out.)

divineveinice.name: Divine Vein (Ice)
divineveinice.description: Applies the following status on space: Foes treat space as impassable terrain while status is active, but status is destructible (with 1 HP). Allies can move into and occupy space. If any allies occupy spaces with Divine Vein (Ice) applied, attacks targeting those spaces will hit the ally over destroying the Divine Vein (Ice). (Divine Vein effects do not stack; replaces any existing Divine Vein effect; Divine Vein effects applied simultaneously cancel each other out. Does not count as defensive terrain. Does not trigger in Pawns of Loki.)

divineveinstone.name: Divine Vein (Stone)
divineveinstone.description: Applies the following effects on space for unit and allies: Grants Def/Res+6 during combat, reduces damage from foe's Specials by 10 during combat (excluding area-of-effect Specials), and reduces damage from area-of-effect Specials by 50% (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials). (Divine Vein effects do not stack; replaces any existing Divine Vein effect; Divine Vein effects applied simultaneously cancel each other out. Does not count as defensive terrain.)

divineveinwater.name: Divine Vein (Water)
divineveinwater.description: Applies the following effects on space: Acts as difficult terrain for foes with Range = 2 (moving over this space costs +1 movement; does not apply to "cannot be slowed by terrain" effects; movement cost cannot exceed unit's allowed movement). Inflicts Spd-5 on foe and reduces the percentage of non-Special "reduce damage by X%" skills by 50% during combat (excluding area-of-effect Specials). (Divine Vein effects do not stack; replaces any existing Divine Vein effect; Divine Vein effects applied simultaneously cancel each other out. Does not count as defensive terrain.)

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from attacks during combat and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by percentage = difference between stats × 4 (max 40%).

dominance.name: Dominance
dominance.description: Unit deals additional damage = total penalties on foe for 1 turn.

dosage.name: Dosage
dosage.description:
Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 to unit during combat and restores 10 HP to unit after combat.
When a foe triggers "grants the【Bonus】 effects active on foe" and "neutralizes any 【Bonus】active on foe" effects from skills such as Essence Drain on unit with this status active, prevents those effects on unit and other targets and neutralizes any【Bonus】effects active on that foe (does not neutralize【Bonus】 effects applied at the same time).

draconichex.name: Draconic Hex
draconichex.description: Inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-5 on foe during combat and inflicts penalty on each of those stats = 5 - current penalty on each of those stats for 1 turn (min 0; calculates each stat penalty independently).

dualstrike.name: Dual Strike
dualstrike.description: If unit initiates combat and is adjacent to an ally with Dual Strike (excluding unit), unit attacks twice. (That turn only. Does not stack.)

empathy.name: Empathy
empathy.description: Grants bonus to unit's Atk/Spd/Def/Res = number of types of【Bonus】effects, excluding stat bonuses, and【Penalty】effects, excluding stat penalties, active on player team and enemy team during combat (max 7).

engarde.name: En Garde
engarde.description: Neutralizes damage outside of combat (from skills like Poison Strike, structures like Bolt Tower, etc.) except damage dealt by area-of-effect Specials.

essencedrain.name: Essence Drain
essencedrain.description: After combat, if unit attacked, grants any 【Bonus】effects active on target and foes within 2 spaces of target to unit and allies with the Essence Drain effect, and neutralizes any【Bonus】active on target and foes within 2 spaces of target (excluding Bonus effects being granted at the same time). After combat, if foe was defeated in combat, restores 10 HP to unit and allies with the Essence Drain effect.

fallenstar.name: Fallen Star (Status Effect)
fallenstar.description: For 1 turn, during unit's first combat in player phase and enemy phase, reduces damage from foe's first attack by 80%.

falsestart.name: False Start
falsestart.description: Through their next action, target cannot activate skill effects that trigger at start of turn. (Start-of-turn effects that cause unit to transform or that refresh availability of Duo Skills or Harmonized Skills will still trigger. If this effect is neutralized at start of turn by skills like Even Recovery, Odd Recovery, etc., effects that would have triggered at start of turn, like healing and damage, will then trigger.)

fellspirit.name: Fell Spirit
fellspirit.description: Inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-4 on foe and neutralizes effects that prevent unit's counterattacks during combat, any "reduces damage by X%" effect that can be triggered only once per combat by unit's equipped Special skill can be triggered up to twice per combat (excludes boosted Special effects from engaging; only highest value applied: does not stack), and also, when unit or foe is engaged, inflicts an additional Atk/Spd/Def/Res-2 on foe during combat. (For 1 turn.)

feud.name: Feud
feud.description: Disables all ally skills (excluding unit's) during combat through unit's next action.

fireemblem.name: Fire Emblem
fireemblem.description:
Neutralizes "effective against" bonuses for all movement types.
Grants bonus to unit's Atk/Spd/Def/Res = highest bonus on each stat between unit and allies within 2 spaces of unit (calculates each stat bonus independently) and reduces damage from foe's first attack by 10 during combat ("first attack" normally means only the first strike; for effects that grant "unit attacks twice," it means the first and second strikes).

foecannotfollowup.name: Foe Cannot Follow-Up
foecannotfollowup.description: Foe cannot make a follow-up attack for 1 turn.

foepenaltydoubler.name: Foe Penalty Doubler
foepenaltydoubler.description: Inflicts penalty on foe's Atk/Spd/Def/Res during combat = any current penalty on each of those stats through their next action. Calculates each stat penalty independently.

foespddifferenceincrease.name: Foe Spd Difference Increase
foespddifferenceincrease.description: Increases Spd difference necessary for foe to make a follow-up attack by 10 during combat for 1 turn.

foresightsnare.name: Foresight Snare
foresightsnare.description:
If foe initiates combat and there were no combat instances on the current turn yet (player phase and enemy phase are counted separately), triggers the following effects:
- Cancels foe's attack, ending their action.
- Inflicts【Isolation】and status preventing counterattacks on foe through foe's next action.
- Cancels Foresight Snare granted to your army.
(These effect trigger after Aether Raids traps but before Savior; does not trigger in Pawns of Loki).

fortifyinghorn.name: Fortifying Horn
fortifyinghorn.description: Grants all allies Atk/Spd/Def/Res+6 for 1 turn.

frozen.name: Frozen
frozen.description:
Reduces inflicted unit's follow-up ability and increases foe's follow-up ability through unit's next action:
Increases Spd difference necessary for unit to make a follow-up attack by X and decreases Spd difference necessary for foe to make a follow-up attack by X during combat (if foe's Def > unit's Def, X = 10 + difference between Def stats × 2; otherwise, X = 10). (For example, if Spd difference necessary increases by 10, Spd must be ≥ 15 more than foe's Spd to make a follow-up attack; stacks with similar skills.)

futurewitness.name: Future Witness
futurewitness.description:
Enables【Canto (２)】.
Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 to unit and reduces damage from foe's first attack by 7 during combat ("first attack" normally means only the first strike; for effects that grant "unit attacks twice," it means the first and second strikes), and also, if unit initiates combat and foe's attack can trigger foe's Special, inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on foe before foe's first attack during combat (cannot exceed the foe's maximum Special cooldown).

gallop.name: Gallop
gallop.description: Unit can move 2 extra spaces (that turn only; only highest value applied; does not stack).

grandstrategy.name: Grand Strategy
grandstrategy.description:
Grants bonus to Atk/Spd/Def/Res during combat = current penalty on each of unit's stats × 2 for 1 turn. (Example: if unit has -7 penalty to Atk, grants Atk+14, for a net bonus of Atk+7.) Calculates each stat bonus independently.
Unit's negative effects that last "through unit's next action" will remain in effect until this status (Grand Strategy) is neutralized.

gravity.name: Gravity (Status Effect)
gravity.description: Restricts target's movement to 1 space through its next action.

greattalent.name: Great Talent
greattalent.description: Adds value of Great Talent (+X) to specified stats (until end of battle; max value of X is determined by the stat reaching the limit of 99, each stat calculated separately and cannot exceed max value for each skill; stat increases are not treated as Bonus effects).

guaranteedfollowups.name: Guaranteed Follow-Ups
guaranteedfollowups.description: Unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack during combat

guaranteedfollowupspp.name: Guaranteed Follow-Ups (Player Phase)
guaranteedfollowupspp.description: If unit initiates combat, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack for 1 turn.

guard.name: Guard (Status Effect)
guard.description: Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target per attack during combat through its next action. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

halvesnonspecialdamagereduction.name: Halves non-Special damage reduction
halvesnonspecialdamagereduction.description: Reduces the percentage of foe's non-Special "reduce damage by X%" skills by 50% during combat for 1 turn (excluding area-of-effect Specials).

hexblade.name: Hexblade
hexblade.description: Calculates damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res during combat for 1 turn (including damage dealt by Specials before combat).

hushspectrum.name: Hush Spectrum
hushspectrum.description: Inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-5 on unit during combat. If unit's attack can trigger unit's Special, inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on unit before unit's first attack during combat (cannot exceed the unit's maximum Special cooldown). If unit's maximum Special cooldown count is reduced (Special trigger is accelerated) and if foe's attack can trigger foe's Special, grants Special cooldown count-1 to foe before unit's first attack during combat.

imbue.name: Imbue
imbue.description: Reduces the effect of【Deep Wounds】on unit by 50% during combat, and restores 40% of unit's maximum HP as unit's combat begins for 1 turn (triggers after effects that deal damage as combat begins; only highest value applied; does not stack).

incited.name: Incited
incited.description: If unit initiates combat, grants bonus to unit's Atk/Spd/Def/Res = number of spaces from start position to end position of unit during combat (max 3; that turn only).

infantryboots.name: Infantry Boots
infantryboots.description: Grants +1 to movement to all allies for 1 turn.

isolation.name: Isolation
isolation.description: Target cannot use or be the target of Assist skills through its next action. (Target can neither use nor be the target of skills like Dance and Sing, skills that neutralize penalties, like Restore and Harsh Command+, etc.)

mobilityincreased.name: Mobility Increased
mobilityincreased.description: Unit can move 1 extra space (that turn only; does not stack).

neutralizebonuses.name: Neutralize Bonuses
neutralizebonuses.description: Neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat for 1 turn.

neutralizeeffectiveagainstarmored.name: Neutralize Effective Against Armored
neutralizeeffectiveagainstarmored.description: Neutralizes "effective against armored" bonuses for 1 turn.

neutralizeeffectiveagainstdragons.name: Neutralize Effective Against Dragons
neutralizeeffectiveagainstdragons.description: Neutralizes "effective against dragons" bonuses for 1 turn.

neutralizeeffectiveagainstflying.name: Neutralize Effective Against Flying
neutralizeeffectiveagainstflying.description: Neutralizes "effective against flying" bonuses for 1 turn.

neutralizesnon-specialnunitsurviveswith1.name: Neutralizes non-Special "unit survives with 1 HP" effects
neutralizesnon-specialnunitsurviveswith1.description: Neutralizes non-Special "if foe would reduce unit's HP to 0, unit survives with 1 HP" effects active on unit through unit's next action.

neutralizepenalties.name: Neutralize Penalties
neutralizepenalties.description: Neutralizes unit's penalties during combat for 1 turn.

nullfollowup.name: Null Follow-Up (Status Effect)
nullfollowup.description: If unit's Spd > foe's Spd during combat, neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks and effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks for 1 turn.

nullpanic.name: Null Panic
nullpanic.description: If unit is inflicted with Panic (bonuses converted into penalties), neutralizes the "converts bonuses on target into penalties" effect for 1 turn. (Even though the effect is neutralized, the Panic status remains, and is treated as a Penalty status.)

panic.name: Panic (Status Effect)
panic.description: Converts bonuses on target into penalties through its next action.

paranoia.name: Paranoia (Status Effect)
paranoia.description:
At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 99%, grants Atk+5 to unit during combat, and also, if unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe's next attack.
At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 99%, if foe initiates combat, and if either that foe's Range = unit's Range or number of 【Penalty】 effects active on foe excluding stat penalties ≥ 3, unit can counterattack before foe's first attack (excluding when unit's Savior effect triggers).

pathfinder.name: Pathfinder
pathfinder.description: When an ally moves through unit's space, that space is counted as 0 spaces moved instead of 1 space. (Unit's space can be freely added to ally's normal movement. Applies only to allies with movement types that allow movement through unit's space.)

penalty.name: Penalty
penalty.description: All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

phantom.name: Phantom
phantom.description: If a skill effect compares unit's stats to a foe's stats, treats unit's stats as if granted +X.

ploy.name: Ploy
ploy.description: Neutralizes【Bonus Doubler】,【Treachery】, and【Grand Strategy】effects active on unit during combat through unit's next action.

potentfollow.name: Potent Follow X%
potentfollow.description: Triggers an additional follow-up attack immediately after unit's standard follow-up attack and deals damage = X% of unit's normal attack damage (if unit cannot make a follow-up attack, this effect triggers when the standard follow-up attack would occur; this effect is treated like a follow-up attack, so effects like "reduce damage by X%" still apply, but this effect is not affected by effects that prevent follow-ups or "attacks twice" effects; only highest value applied; does not stack).

potentfollow100.name: Potent Follow (100%)
potentfollow100.description: Triggers an additional follow-up attack immediately after unit's standard follow-up attack and deals damage = 100% of unit's normal attack damage (if unit cannot make a follow-up attack, this effect triggers when the standard follow-up attack would occur; this effect is treated like a follow-up attack, so effects like "reduce damage by X%" still apply, but this effect is not affected by effects that prevent follow-ups or "attacks twice" effects; only highest value applied; does not stack).

preemptpulse.name: Preempt Pulse
preemptpulse.description: Grants Special cooldown count-1 to unit before unit's first attack during combat.

rallyspectrum.name: Rally Spectrum
rallyspectrum.description: Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 to unit during combat and if unit's attack can trigger unit's Special, grants Special cooldown count-X to unit before unit's first attack during combat (X = 1 if unit can trigger the "unit attacks twice" effect or if unit's maximum Special cooldown count is reduced (Special trigger is accelerated); otherwise, X = 2). (That turn only.)

reduceareaofeffectspecialdamagetaken.name: Reduce Area-of-Effect Special Damage Taken
reduceareaofeffectspecialdamagetaken.description: Reduces damage from area-of-effect Specials by 80% for 1 turn. (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials)

reducesdamagewheninitiating.name: Reduces Damage When Initiating
reducesdamagewheninitiating.description: If unit initiates combat, reduces damage from foe's first attack during combat by 40% for 1 turn.

reflex.name: Reflex
reflex.description:
Reduces damage from foe's first attack by 7 during combat ("first attack" normally means only the first strike; for effects that grant "unit attacks twice," it means the first and second strikes) and unit's next attack deals damage = total damage reduced from foe's first attack (by any source, including other skills; resets at end of combat).
(For 1 turn.)

reposition.name: Reposition
reposition.description: Range = 1. Target moves to opposite side of unit.

resonanceblades.name: Resonance: Blades
resonanceblades.description: Grants Atk/Spd+4 during combat for 1 turn.

resonanceshields.name: Resonance: Shields
resonanceshields.description: Grants Def/Res+4 during combat and the following effect for 1 turn: "During unit's first combat in player phase or enemy phrase, foe cannot make a follow-up attack."

sabotage.name: Sabotage
sabotage.description: Inflicts penalty on unit's Atk/Spd/Def/Res during combat = highest penalty on each stat between unit and allies within 2 spaces of unit through its next action. Calculates each stat penalty independently.

salvage.name: Salvage (Status Effect)
salvage.description:
Enables【Canto (２)】.
When【Canto Control】is applied to unit, if unit's Range = 1, unit can move 2 spaces with Canto instead of 1 space, and if unit's Range = 2, unit can move 1 space with Canto instead of 0 spaces.

savior.name: Savior
savior.description:
Unit takes ally's space, enters combat in ally's place, and receives all after-combat effects.
Savior will not trigger if ally is on terrain that unit cannot move to or if multiple units are able to use Savior during the same combat. If Savior triggers, after-combat movement effects do not occur.

schism.name: Schism
schism.description: Neutralizes Triangle Attack, Dual Strike, and Pathfinder effects active on unit through unit's next action. Unit is excluded from ally Triangle Attack and Dual Strike effects calculated using numbers of allies. When this status (Schism) is neutralized, Triangle Attack, Dual Strike, and Pathfinder effects are also neutralized.

sharespoils.name: Share Spoils
sharespoils.description: Inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-5 on unit during combat and neutralizes "reduces damage by X%" effects from unit's non-Special skills (excluding area-of-effect Specials). If foe initiates combat and if unit is defeated in combat, grants another action to that foe after combat (this effect has priority over other similar effects, including Time Is Light; in such cases, these other similar effects are treated as not having triggered).

sharespoilsplus.name: Share Spoils+
sharespoilsplus.description:
Inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-5 on unit during combat and neutralizes "reduces damage by X%" effects from unit's non-Special skills (excluding area-of-effect Specials).
Once per turn for the entire map, if foe initiates combat and if unit is defeated in combat, grants another action to that foe after combat (this effect has priority over other similar effects aside from Share Spoils; if this status and Share Spoils are both active at the same time, they are both treated as having been triggered; other similar effects aside from Share Spoils are treated as not having triggered).

sing/dance.name: Sing/Dance
sing/dance.description: Range = 1. Grants another action to target ally.

smite.name: Smite
smite.description: Range = 1. Pushes target ally 2 spaces away.

specialblade.name: Special Blade
specialblade.description: Enables use of Specials for all allies.

specialcooldowncharge.name: Special Cooldown Charge +1
specialcooldowncharge.description: Grants Special cooldown charge +1 per attack during combat for 1 turn. (only highest value applied; does not stack)

stall.name: Stall
stall.description: If unit has "unit can move 1 extra space," converts that effect into "restricts movement to 1 space" through its next action.

style.name: Style
style.description:
Change Style using the Style button at the bottom of the screen.
A unit's Style is only active when that unit is taking an action. When unit is equipped with a skill that has a Style, unit will not be able to use skills like Duo Skills or Harmonized Skills. Style use is disabled when unit is deployed using Pair Up or when unit is equipped with multiple skills that have a Style.

timesgate.name: Time's Gate
timesgate.description: Allies within 4 spaces of unit can move to a space adjacent to unit (that turn only).

timesgrip.name: Time's Grip
timesgrip.description: Inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-4 during combat. Neutralizes unit's skills during allies' combat through unit's next action.

traverseterrain.name: Traverse Terrain
traverseterrain.description: Unit cannot be slowed by terrain for 1 turn. (does not apply to impassable terrain)

treachery.name: Treachery
treachery.description: Unit deals additional damage = total bonuses on unit for 1 turn.

triangleadept.name: Triangle Adept (Status Effect)
triangleadept.description: If unit has weapon-triangle advantage, boosts Atk by 20% through its next action, and if unit has weapon-triangle disadvantage, reduces Atk by 20% through its next action.

triangleattack.name: Triangle Attack
triangleattack.description: If unit initiates combat and 2 or more allies (excluding unit) with Triangle Attack are within 2 spaces of unit, unit attacks twice.

undefended.name: Undefended
undefended.description: Unit cannot be protected by Savior through their next action.

vantage.name: Vantage (Status Effect)
vantage.description: If foe initiates combat, unit can counterattack before foe's first attack for 1 turn.

dancersveil.name: Dancer's Veil
dancersveil.description: Allows one random ally that has already acted to take another action.

warpbubble.name: Warp Bubble
warpbubble.description: Foes cannot warp into spaces within 4 spaces of unit. (Does not affect foes with Pass skills or warp effects from structures, like camps and fortresses in Rival Domains.)
